org.streaminer.stream.classifier.bayes

Class MultiLossyBayes

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.streaminer.stream.classifier.AbstractClassifier<D,Map<C,C>>
      • org.streaminer.stream.classifier.AbstractMultiClassifier<Data,String>
        • org.streaminer.stream.classifier.bayes.MultiBayes
          • org.streaminer.stream.classifier.bayes.MultiLossyBayes
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Classifier<Data,Map<String,String>>, Learner<Data,PredictionModel<Data,Map<String,String>>>, Model, PredictionModel<Data,Map<String,String>>

    public class MultiLossyBayes
extends MultiBayes

    This implementation of the MultiBayes learner uses the Lossy-Counting Bayes implementation, which counts at fixed memory space.

    Author:
    Christian Bockermann <chris@jwall.org>
    See Also:
